Description:
'AS NEW' CHARMER ON OWN TITLE
A stone's throw from Croydon North shops and bus is the totally renewed and rejuvenated weatherboard cottage home on own titled approx. 400m2. With remote controlled gate entry, wide brick pillared double carport and easy care private gardens this superbly modernized and fresh painted 3 bedroom home retains its appealing charm. With superb new kitchen and bathroom, new central heating, top quality carpet, window furnishings and superior timber floorboards it's just like a new home! With private courtyard and garden shed to enhance its charm, this must be right for you!

Description:
A Touch Of Old South In The East
Set in a coveted location close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and Good Shepherd PS, this is a home of enormous dimensions. Space will not be an issue thanks to a thoughtfully designed layout comprising formal lounge and dining room, open plan family room and meals area adjoining the kitchen. Bedrooms include a master with BIR and spa ensuite, three with built-in robes and a 5th bedroom/study. With a long list of extras this is sure to impress the most discerning buyer.
Features:
* alarm, GDH, ducted vacuum, laundry chute, zoned evaporative AC
* open fireplace in lounge
* ensuite with double shower, double vanity & spa bath.
* 10ft ceilings, grand portico entrance
* close to McAdams Square, Eastland, Eastlink access and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre
* Just a stones throw to the Yarra Valley; Croydon Hills PS & Yarra Road PS close by

Description:
Young & Fresh
CLOSING DATE SALE
Tuesday 26th August, 2014 at 5.30pm
(Unless sold prior)
OWNER IS GENUINELY SELLING
(All Written Offers will be considered)
At only just over 1 year old this double storey brick veneer townhouse is young and desirable, nestled perfectly in a quiet part of Croydon North, offering you 4 good sized robed bedrooms, the main bedroom is downstairs with a large walk in robe, full ensuite with generous double shower.
It's modern living at its best with the spacious open plan family meals area downstairs adjacent to the kitchen and has full view of the backyard and parkland's reserve at the rear.
The gourmet kitchen is well appointed with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops and island work bench to ensure the chef of the family makes their kitchen rule for any meal occasion. Before we step outside we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, main bathroom with separate toilet, powder room downstairs, internal access to garage, alarm system, ducted vacuum, quality carpets and tiles, window furnishings and blinds plus light filled interiors with soft modern colours and tones.
Outside the entertaining balcony will be the ideal spot to enjoy family gatherings, casual BBQ's, a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
The large double garage has plenty of room for the family cars.
It is a fantastic opportunity for the astute investor as home would return approximately $500 to $520 per week rent.
All this is close to Croydon North and Chirnside Park shopping centres, respected schools, parklands, walking tracks and all other facilities you need to enjoy a convenient relaxed lifestyle.
Be quick and book your viewing today.
SECTION 32's AVAILABLE.

Description:
HIGH CLASS LIVING
Brand new townhouse with commanding street frontage, a Croydon North address delivering unsurpassed convenience and striking interior with open living flowing onto a large under roof alfresco perfect for summertime entertaining. Quality kitchen fitted with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher, three bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite, big double garage with remote door and internal access. Other features include fully landscaped gardens, under stairs storage, gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning and much more. Call now to make substantial stamp duty saving and to choose your own internal colours.

Description:
Peaceful Environment
Providing security and privacy with a lengthy driveway that separates this home from the street scape, it offers space and a quality environment for the down sizer to enjoy complete peace and tranquility. For the astute investors wanting a quality property for their portfolio, it is securely let until 29th of November 2014 for $1516pcm ($350pw).
Sharing the property with just three others, you can expect to find a brilliant display of low maintenance living, yet with enough room to move around with a spacious garden and access down the side of the home for trailer or small boat etc.
Inside, features open plan living with large lounge room and spacious meals area overlooked by a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, gas cook tops and wall oven. The master bedroom has a walk in robe with a full ensuite, while the 2 other bedrooms have built in robes and are complimented by a zoned family bathroom with a separate toilet.
Added extras are gas ducted heating, air conditioner and oversized double lock-up garage with remote control. All amenities including Chirnside Shopping Centre, Croydon North Shops and schools are close by.

Description:
Luxury Personified, Pristine Presentation & A Lush Setting
Sale by Set Date 19/8/2014
Abounded by lush parklands and tucked away neatly into its leafy setting, this exquisitely presented single-level residence delivers a coveted lifestyle epitomised by its luxurious appointments and finishes, superior comfort and convenience to a wide range of local amenities.
The magnificent free-flowing interiors of this desirable home offer an open plan living area enhanced plushly with quality carpets highlighting the sense of prestige, extending into a bright, tiled meals area and overseen by the appealing kitchen equipped with stainless-steel gas cooktop, electric oven and separate grill plus range hood, corner pantry and breakfast bar.
A vast master bedroom is complemented with an entire wall of fitted robes and enjoys an en suite-effect to the sparking family bathroom with modern fittings, separate bath and shower plus feature tiling. A further two bedrooms, both with double robes ensure ample accommodation.
Further highlights of this delectable home include a separate toilet, double linen cupboard and huge fitted laundry with work surfaces and plentiful storage, ducted heating, tiled entry and deck with ramp access to the shady, secure courtyard with garden shed and access to the remote double garage.
Superbly positioned in a vibrant green belt just moments to Hughes Park and numerous reserves, the added convenience of Croydon North Shopping at the end of the road plus Chirnside Park Shopping Centre just five-minutes away, as well as quality schooling including the respected Oxley College and Yarra Valley Grammar, Maroondah Adventure Golf Park, Yarra Valley Equestrian Centre, transport and much more.
Privacy, peace and convenience are all effortlessly conveyed and reflect the sumptuous lifestyle on offer; a perfect first home, delightful downsizer or astute investment for your portfolio, enquire today!
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282

Description:
Tranquil 1/4 Acre Block In Popular Pocket!
Sale by Negotiation
Whether you're a builder, investor or in search of the ideal allotment to build your dream home (subject to council approval), this 1231m2 (approx) block presents the perfect opportunity to dwell in an established estate and design your home to encapsulate the treed outlook and tranquil surrounds.
With the indulgence of having the prestigious name Croydon North to capitalise on, this vacant block is the ideal opportunity to lay down your roots knowing your family will be growing up in an attractive and tasteful suburb. Providing a surplus of amenities at your fingertips, this huge allotment is perfectly positioned within walking distance to Warrien Reserve with walking track and bus services, as well as being within close proximity to Croydon North Shopping Plaza, Croydon Hills Primary School, Lutheran Primary School, Lutheran College and Croydon Railway Station.
Positioned only 28 km's (approx) north-east of Melbourne CBD, Croydon North is a peaceful and rustic pocket, hedged between Wonga Park, Croydon Hills and Chirnside Park, with large blocks, well-presented homes and only a short drive to EastLink and Maroondah Highway for easy commuting to the city. You'll be surrounded by wandering hills and lots of walking tracks along the creeks and reserves, not to mention enjoying the fruits of living close to great wineries in the Yarra Ranges and an eclectic range of eateries in the Dandenongs.
With plenty of scope to build a sizable dwelling, there's no better place to call home or invest than here - enquire now!
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320

Description:
A Hidden Treasure To Behold
Conveniently situated back from the road to ensure peace and privacy, this instantly warm and appealing townhouse is perfect for the first-home buyer, investor or retiree.
Presenting a landscaped driveway, portico entrance and bagged brick veneer facade, this solid home features open plan living, incorporating a welcoming lounge room with gas log fire and polished floorboards, adjoining dining and updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances; electric oven and gas stove, dishwasher, step-in pantry and plenty of cupboards and bench space.
The bedrooms are generously sized and feature built-in robes, as well as having the added bonus of being within easy access to the neatly presented bathroom including a bath and shower-the essential hub of relaxation and rejuvenation, while the separate laundry offers functionality convenience, containing cupboards for extra storage.
The paved outdoor area is a low maintenance space in which to enjoy catching a few rays as you read the morning paper, furthermore, your comfort and convenience is well taken care of here, packed with inclusions listing as; gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, evaporative cooling, down lights, established low-maintenance garden and remote single garage with pedestrian access to rear.
The position is ideal, being within walking distance to the bus stop, with Village Primary School, Oxley College and Griff Hunt Reserve, as well as Croydon North Shopping Plaza and EastLink only a short drive away.
If you're looking for unique character and the warmth of home, this hidden treasure is sure to catch your attention.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Address: 74 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Flawless Presentation for a Perfect Start
It simply doesn't get any better than this immaculate and wonderfully inviting residence, set amid an oasis of greenery just moments to amenities and effortlessly providing a lifestyle of ease and tranquillity; a definite must-see for first homebuyers, downsizers and investors.
Offering picture-perfect presentation with its fully rendered facade, manicured gardens and exposed aggregate driveway and footpaths, the eye-catching streetscape is a perfect introduction to the impressive interiors.
Conveying a sense of well-being, a charming, spacious and comfortable living area is beautifully enhanced with floating floorboards, feature plasterwork and walls plus a split-system unit ensuring optimum comfort in summer.
A bright and attractive kitchen is well-appointed with stainless-steel electric cooking, range hood and dishwasher and oversees a sizeable tiled dining zone providing a sensational entertaining venue with its access to a vast, undercover deck and appealing, tiered courtyard with white pebble and paved embellishments.
Three generous bedrooms enjoy fitted built-in robes with sliding doors, (two with double robes), and share the ultra-chic family bathroom with separate bath and shower, modern vanity, feature tiling and glass bricked walling.
A separate toilet, compact laundry with storage and external access, ducted heating, air-conditioning, downlights, ceiling fans, timber venetians and a single carport with secure roller door conclude.
Set in the lush and leafy rolling hills of Croydon, just a five-minute stroll to Maroondah Village shopping via walking paths through the local play park, and close to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and Cinema, Maroondah Adventure Golf Park, quality schooling and transport, this enjoyable home deserves your full attention, enquire today!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
More Like a House
You'll enjoy space, style and privacy in this beautifully presented 4 bedroom unit that feels more like a house. Nestled at the front of a boutique block of only three, it offers you low-maintenance living near Croydon North Plaza, transport, Village School Primary, Luther College, Chirnside shops and Hochkins Ridge Reserve. A beautiful landscaped front garden, new double carport and new side entrance create fabulous appeal and easy access. Instantly welcoming, the fresh, sun-kissed interior is styled with contemporary decor. Four bedrooms (3 with BIRs), a family bathroom and separate toilet are zoned off the hallway. Discover the ease of a modern open plan kitchen appointed with s/s appliances, pantry with slide-out drawers and excellent storage. Relax in the elegance of the lounge/dining room, or unwind in the good-sized family/meals room with dado panelling. A pretty, easy-care landscaped garden and covered alfresco area with stunning mountain views provide an idyllic backdrop for entertaining. More highlights: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, under-house storage with space for a workshop and off street parking.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
Spacious, Stylish, Quiet & Hassle-Free
For a low-maintenance lifestyle or investment that provides you with space, style and convenience, you must see this beautifully presented single-level home. Walking distance to transport, childcare and Croydon North Plaza, this gorgeous 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is hidden well back in the service road in a boutique block of four. A bay window and verandah with treetop views create instant appeal. You won't need to lift a finger, because the light-filled interior is accentuated by high ceilings, crisp neutral tones and contemporary decor. Three double bedrooms (2 with BIRs), a family bathroom and laundry with storage are privately zoned off the hallway. The master boasts split system, ceiling fan and ensuite. Two large living zones - both with bay windows and Foxtel points - and a modern open plan kitchen featuring a dishwasher and stainless steel appliances give you space to relax and entertain. Enjoy the treetop views from the lounge room, or kick back in the casual family/meals room. A roofed patio, paved courtyard and private landscaped garden ensure easy outdoor living, without the upkeep. Appointments include: remote double garage, ducted heating and 2 split systems. Close to cafes, bus, kinder, reserves, schools, Chirnside shopping and Oxley College.

Description:
Private and Immaculate Rear Unit
For privacy, a quiet position and a low maintenance lifestyle, this rear unit on a block of 3 really is hard to beat. Looking beautiful from the outside with its classically inspired facade and red bricks the home is impeccably presented with warm colours and plenty of light making it instantly comforting. It features a generous lounge room that is complemented by a large kitchen, a meals area and an adjoining room accessed by double doors that could serve as anything from a dining room or living area to a study or bedroom. There are 2 dedicated bedrooms with wall to wall built in wardrobes as well as a spacious family bathroom with separate toilet. Ducted heating and air conditioning are included and outside you find a double garage with remote door and compact grass free courtyard with a lovely entertaining deck. With buses nearby, the home is also within minutes of Croydon North Shopping Plaza and primary school with central Croydon and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre easily accessed.

Description:
A Rose in bloom is a joy for sure!
This immaculate 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home is certainly worth inspecting.
It just feels right from the moment you drive through the lockable gates into the undercover parking, and again, as you enter the door to the very spacious open plan lounge. You can tell the home has been looked after.
The lovely north facing arch windows allow the family chef to prepare meals while taking in the wonderful view and much appreciated winter sunshine.
The ample Master and second bedrooms have BIRs and are conveniently positioned opposite the family sized bathroom and separate toilet.
There is also a sizable laundry that leads to a well-designed covered patio and yard area with plenty of room for a veggie patch.
Located on a picture perfect level block with no owner's corporation, this home is ideally suited for retirees, 1st home buyers and investors.
Dot point summary:
• 2 Bedrooms, 1 bathroom
• Fully insulated and plaster lined High cathedral ceilings
• Large Open plan lounge, meals and Kitchen area
• Cosy Gas Wall heater
• Large laundry with dual access bathroom/toilet
• Draw down outdoor window shutters
• Large Garden Shed and room for a veggie garden
• Single plus car carport with room to make a double garage with rear access for trailer STCA
• Easy walk to the Nth Croydon Shopping Centre and public transport, parks and more
• Securely fenced & Gated front yard with room for multiple cars & toys!

Description:
Enviable Lifestyle in Premium Court
This is the one you've been waiting for. Positioned at the end of a quiet court and framed by meticulously landscaped gardens, this stylish, well-appointed home delivers everything that it promises.
Character filled and immaculately presented, flowing sun-filled interiors include two separate living zones, a spacious formal lounge evoking an arresting atmosphere, in addition to a casual living zone incorporating the tiled family room showcasing a gas log fire and built-in speakers, meals and fully equipped timber kitchen comprising an electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, stone bench, plenty of cupboards and bench space and breakfast bar, conveniently located only steps away from the large outdoor entertaining area - adding another living zone, perfect for larger gatherings and with the added luxury of a sparkling outdoor spa, undercover for seasonal use.
The family friendly design ensures privacy for parents, with the master bedroom boasting a walk-in robe and full ensuite with large shower and twin vanity, whilst the additional three bedrooms contain built-in robes and are generous in size, particularly the fourth double sized bedroom, which also contains two double built-in robes. Zoned along with the bedrooms is the well presented family bathroom featuring a separate bath, shower and adjoining toilet.
The many features of this delightful home include a private study room, separate laundry with cupboards and bench, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, nine foot ceilings, decorative cornices, quality window furnishings, down lights, awnings, three water tanks, solar panels, security alarm, remote double garage with pedestrian access to rear and sizable backyard offering a restful retreat for parents and plenty of adventure for children and pets.
Meticulous grounds are an integral part of the overall presentation of this highly-desirable residence, occupying a 743m2 (approx) allotment and surrounded by beautiful homes, all within strolling distance to Yarra Road Primary School, Croydon Hills Primary School, bus stop and Candlebark Walk, as well as being within close proximity to Luther College, McAdam Square Shopping Centre and EastLink only a short commute away.
If position and style are important to you, you can't go past this meticulously-maintained home, affording one lucky family a lifestyle to be envied.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Address: 11 Palmer Avenue (enter via Baringa Road) CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Sprawling Homestead Devoted To Entertaining
Sale by Negotiation
Meticulous gardens and manicured lawns amass a substantial 1540m2 (approx) allotment, boasting two street frontages, this serene property forms a magical setting for this sprawling homestead which showcases enviable, spacious living devoted to entertaining and relaxing.
An arresting full length verandah overlooking the lush gardens and open spaces creates the feeling of being whisked away to a country retreat, and once inside, the interior continues to employ a theme of spaciousness, showcasing multiple living zones constructed over two levels.
The formal fireside lounge adjoins the spacious dining room and features a wet bar to ensure you play the perfect host, showcasing large windows to draw light and green gardens inside. Leadlight doors separate the formal living from the casual, open plan family area comprising a Coonara, meals and fully equipped timber kitchen with double electric oven, gas stove and dishwasher. The lower level houses a spacious rumpus/teen retreat and features a bathroom for added convenience and versatility.
Four of the five bedrooms include built-in robes and are zoned away from the main bedroom along with a stylish family bathroom. The master retreat offers spacious proportions, walk-in robe and a luxurious ensuite with corner spa, shower and large vanity.
A home of this calibre will impress with quality inclusions that have to be seen to be truly appreciated, with highlights including; large laundry, cellar and copious amounts of storage under the home, gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, high ceilings and remote double garage with internal entry, as well as two street frontages; Palmer Avenue and Baringa Road.
Located to suit the busy family or couple, amenities include the nearby bus stop, Croydon North Shopping Plaza, Warrien Reserve with barbeque area and playground, kindergarten, Croydon Hills Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar School.
Truly a unique and captivating property, this home will exceed your expectations in every way.
Ash Thompson : 0401 205 320

Description:
Brand new luxury for you!
Set in a peaceful court location on 382m2 (approx) only a stones throw from McAdams Square speciality stores, supermarket, transport and a range of quality schools including Yarra Valley Grammar, Good Sheppard Primary, Yarra Road Primary, Croydon Hills Primary and Luther College, this sparkling new three bedroom home offers a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
Exuding quality and contemporary style from the luxurious robed bedrooms, master with walk in robe and en suite, to the light filled open plan living area and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, caesar stone bench tops and impressive glass sliding doors opening to the private outdoor entertaining area, this stunning home is sure to impress first home buyers, downsizers and wise investors alike.
Further features include polished Tassie oak hardwood floors, ducted heating, modern bathroom, low maintenance gardens and double remote lock up garage.
